first_para: Nicola Claire Blackwood (born 16 October 1979, Johannesburg, South Africa) is a Conservative Party politician. She was elected as Member of Parliament (MP) for Oxford West and Abingdon in the 2010 election.

full.extract: Nicola Claire Blackwood (born 16 October 1979, Johannesburg, South Africa) is a Conservative Party politician. She was elected as Member of Parliament (MP) for Oxford West and Abingdon in the 2010 election.
full.title: Nicola Blackwood
